title:
Why do the Wilmington Sharks charge for admission when they can not pay players and pay the City a very nominal fee of $450.00 per game for using Legion Stadium and keep Sponsor Income and Concession Stand revenues?

The take in-

-Ticket Sales

-Sponsorships

-Concession Revenues

-Media Revenues



With a low cost structure,their tickets are about the same as UNCW.

Where does all the incomes go and what do they claim as \expenses\"?"
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=18782
